f=open("test.log")
lines = f.readlines()
f.close()

newline = input("give me more data: ")
lines.append(newline)


f=open("test.log", "w")
for line in lines:
    line=line.rstrip()
    print(line, file=f)
    print(line)

f.close()

give me more data: line 4
asd
dsf
sdfdsf
sfdfdsfdsfds
line 4
